amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $11.2 million from funding for the Occupational Safety and Health Administration in order to increase funding for programs under the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for the Occupational Health and Safety Agency by $11.2 million and to increase funds for programs funded by the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act commensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norwood amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 240 (Roll no. 370).
